name: TELEKOM SLOVENIJE
description: Telekom Slovenije is the leading Slovenian provider of the most advanced ICT services and solutions. The Company continuously ensures the development and introduction of new innovative technologies. It provides subscribers an excellent user experience and superior services that match their needs and expectations. The Telekom Slovenije Group operates in South-East Europe. IPKO is the leading provider of mobile and fixed broadband services in Kosovo, while the Group is also present via its subsidiaries in Croatia, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Serbia, Montenegro and North Macedonia.
